product_name: Serfas Seca RS Foldable Road Tire - 700 x 23
long_description: Consider the Serfas Seca RS foldable road tire a speedy all-around tire, be it training, everyday rides or commutes, thanks to puncture protection, long-wearing performance and great value. Features 60-durometer center ridge for long life and 56-durometer sides for enhanced cornering performance. Flat protection system is integrated into the tire for excellent puncture protection. Smooth center with updated minimalist tread on the sides offers excellent, efficient rolling. Serfas Seca RS foldable road tire features a supple 120 tpi casing to keep weight low and offer a great ride quality.
short_description: Consider the Serfas Seca RS foldable road tire a speedy all-around tire, be it training, everyday rides or commutes, thanks to puncture protection, long-wearing performance and great value.
